_comment: This is an example Arweave wallet file structure.
DO NOT use this example wallet for actual deployments!
1. Use the Arweave wallet generator: https://arweave.app/add
3. Or use the RATi setup wizard: ./setup.sh
- Any valid wallet structure will work
- Keep the private key secure and backed up
- Never commit your actual wallet.json to version control
- Store wallet files securely with restricted file permissions
- Consider using hardware wallets for high-value deployments
